Privacy & Data Collection

What This Site Collects

When you sign in with Google, this site collects:

  • Your Google ID
  • Your email address

The site also collects information about your current user state to enhance your site experience.

How It's Used

Your information is used to identify you when you return to enhance your experience. Your data is not shared with anyone else.

Cookies & Tracking

This site only uses technical cookies for authentication and does not track non-logged-in users.
